publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-65 Robin Harper: That the Parliament calls upon the Parliamentary Bureau to propose a motion to the Parliament adding Tommy Sheridan to the membership of the Equal Opportunities Committee.

S1M-65 Robin Harper: Equal Opportunities—That the Parliament calls upon the Parliamentary Bureau to propose a motion to the Parliament adding Tommy Sheridan to the membership of the Equal Opportunities Committee. (lodged on 22 June 1999)
